Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI allowed me to get instant feedback without any social or academic recourse

Question 41.Response: Feedback from a teacher feels more human (shocking)
